Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' to be followed by 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases leading to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' across variants leading to 'SW-EIC Reject'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Average time it takes from 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case

Name: Total time from 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' to 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in cases of major revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' in the context of the review process efficiency
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' in cases ending with 'SW-EIC Accept' versus 'SW-EIC Reject'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Accept occurs

Name: Average time from 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' to 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in successful resubmissions
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Minimum time to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' grouped by 'case:concept:name'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case
